column5: Thats not cool Roy! You make people post all kinds of garbage on here and you erase my post? You could have locked it but to remove it completely? Not cool.  But of course you being pro capitalist, the post was not to your liking, so it had to go.
What's not cool is you posting this response here. If you have an issue withthe mod's take it up with the mod's, by PM.
He probably did it so that people don't think you're a moron, JB.  He's doing it to HELP you.  Besides, he owns the board.  Can do what he wants.
I don't think he makes anybody post anything.   Well he did make me post this.....
